posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for T216 cards (all backs, all conditions).

Willing to buy, also willing to trade (have T216 to trade or other sets).

Email preferred.

Cheers,
Steve

This thin Kotton is still available if you're interested.
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=239504[/url]

And I have this MINO which I wasn't planning to sell or trade, but that just depends on what's being offered.

Thanks, Glenn -- I actually have both of those.

Much appreciated,
Steve
The have a Dooin cincy Mino.

I would trade for something I wanted more...it is in a PSA 1.5 holder...though you might already have this as I have seen 1 other. :)

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/pt216ve.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks, Leon.  :)  I do actually have a VE McGraw, although yours is a little nicer -- it's in very nice condition for such a fragile set!

Also, thanks, Cory -- I also have Dooin Cincy.
Do you have any t216 dots millers?

Sorry, no Millers to trade, but if I come across any, I'll let you know!

Cheers,
Steve
Still looking for Kotton, Mino, and Virgina Extra cards... Thanks!
